duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the overall daily operations of the Medical Department, including delivery of medical care to an individual patient load.
Ensure the delivery of high quality, comprehensive medical care.
Maintain financial stability by monitoring the medical clinic budget.
Implement best practice standards, protocols, and policies.
Oversee transdisciplinary delivery of care including collaboration with multiple disciplines.
Lead and model an attitude of teamwork and servant leadership.

education_certification.credential: Board certification in internal medicine or family medicine
